name: Karanda
description:
Karaṇḍa (करण्ड): a piece of wood, block

Abstract minimal electronic music composition with generative visuals. 

This work is part of a series inspired by Indian classical music and abstract electronic music. Materials created using AI-based systems, including adversarial models and large sequence models. Timbral materialst then algorithmically processed and arranged and given final form through spontaneous improvisation. A chance to look inwards and still the mind.
